Absorb damage with Heavy Assault's shield ability.
Your HIVE at [*region*] has become active.

Participation Requirements
Members of an outfit enlisted in the war may only enter the match if they have Loyalty Rank 3 or greater and the correct Outfit War privileges for their outfit rank are assigned. Traveling to the match will lock you to the Outfit War on this server, and you may only participate in one Outfit War per server.

Qualifier Matches
Outfits play weekly qualification matches, with only the best win/loss ratios carrying on into the playoffs. Ties during a qualifier are broken based on performance in the match itself, so fight your hardest.

Playoff Matches
During the playoff phase, each match will thin the herd until the final three outfits for each faction are pitted against one another for the championships. Victory points are introduced in this phase, and take precedence over match record for scoring purposes. Outfits start with a number of victory points based on their win/loss record during Qualifiers.

Championships
During the last match of the season, the highest rated outfits brawl for the title of victor for the gold, silver, and bronze brackets.

Rewards
When your outfit is knocked out of the competition, whenever that may be, you receive rewards based on your outfit's ranking. Players who have ended at least one match in the combat zone are eligible for personal rewards. There are a combination of guild rewards, and personal rewards available, based on the rank achieved.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> Thank you for checking in. Our researchers are breaking down the data from that vehicle you reclaimed, but there seems to be a missing puzzle piece.

The Sunderer is an armored transport capable of carrying an entire squad into battle. It can also be upgraded with a variety of support capabilities such as mobile respawn.Drive this Sunderer to the waypoint marked on your HUD.
During the collapse of the Warpgate, a wave of energy disabled many of our vehicles, and they've since been left stranded. The energy has not dissipated on its own as of yet.

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> And your efforts have not gone unnoticed- investigating the remains of the shattered warpgate, researching new vegetative life forms, re-enabling various vehicular technologies, and aiding with the tests of a new array of storm-resistant armors.

The heavier Nano-Armor Cloaking device passively grants 100 shield health to the Infiltrator. While the cloak is active, it will also reduce incoming small arms damage by 25%. Nano-armor can remain active for 8 seconds and recharges in 11.5 seconds.

Their extreme mobility is their defining trait and allows them to move faster than most other soldiers. Each one of the Light Assault's various Jumpjet configurations grants them the ability to take on different obstacles, shifting their role in combat. The Standard Jumpjets allow them to make their way over barriers and enemy's heads alike. The hovering Glider Jets can be used to descend on vulnerable ground targets and cross chasms.

Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.25 seconds and reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 75 meters.
Apply the single use African Forest camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Prevents lock-on weaponry from targeting allied aircraft within 125 meters of the Galaxy, and does not affect the Galaxy itself.

USE
Right-click on map to use.

DESCRIPTION
Requires Reserved Asset permissions.

Calls down an Orbital Strike on the target location.

Max 2.

Generates a shield for the Sunderer when deployed that will absorb up to a certain amount of damage, but will regenerate over time. Damage done to the Sunderer or the shield will delay the shields regeneration for 9 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Remember, slick, the bridge is out, so you can either jump it or go around. Just don't give your ride a bath, because... you know... science reasons.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 250 health. This effect does not trigger from quick melee attacks.
